creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription:
Signature; Stamp; Inscriptions 

Etched inscription, UL: [Morceau apres un tableau Allemand], superimposed over a faintly inscribed inscription: [Elephant et le singe]
markings: Artist\'s stamp in red ink, LC: [HG (in circle)]; Watermark, lower edge: [M.B.M.]
provenance: William M. Ladd, Portland, Ore.; Herschel V. Jones, Minneapolis; his gift to MIA, 1916
signed: Signed in the plate, UL: [H. Guerard]
title: Elephant and Monkey
